assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All authors declare that they have no conflict of interest to declare.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethics approval was obtained from the Medical Research Ethics Committee, University of Malaya Medical Centre (MEC identification number: 20144-141 & 20161-1995). All procedures performed in studies involving human participants were in accordance with the ethical standards of the Medical Research Ethics Committee, University of Malaya Medical Centre and with the 1964 Helsinki declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.
